member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Controls.GanttView.GanttDragDependenciesBehavior
member.summary: The class for drag-drop linking operation behaviors for the RadGanttView control.

member.name: M:Telerik.Windows.Controls.GanttView.GanttDragDependenciesBehavior.Link(Telerik.Windows.Controls.Scheduling.SchedulingLinkState)
member.summary: Applies the effect of the link operation when it is successful.
member.param: SchedulingLinkState that provides context for the current operation.
member.remarks: This method is called only if the link operation is successful and it is meant to do the actual link.

member.name: M:Telerik.Windows.Controls.GanttView.GanttDragDependenciesBehavior.LinkCanceled(Telerik.Windows.Controls.Scheduling.SchedulingLinkState)
member.summary: When overridden in a derived class cleans up a cancelled link operation. This method is called only in the context of the link source control.
member.param: SchedulingLinkState that provides context for the current operation.
member.remarks: This method is called only when the link operation is cancelled by the user. If this method is called, the Link method is not called.

member.name: M:Telerik.Windows.Controls.GanttView.GanttDragDependenciesBehavior.CanLink(Telerik.Windows.Controls.Scheduling.SchedulingLinkState)
member.summary: Gets the value specifying whether the link operation can be completed, or not.
member.param: SchedulingLinkState identifying the current link operation.
member.returns: True when the link operation can be finished, otherwise false.
member.remarks: This method is called on every mouse move.

member.name: M:Telerik.Windows.Controls.GanttView.GanttDragDependenciesBehavior.CreateInstanceOverride
member.summary: When implemented in a derived class, creates a new instance of the Telerik.Windows.Core.PlatformIndependentFreezable derived class.
member.returns: The new instance.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Controls.GanttView.GanttDragDropBehavior
member.summary: The behavior class responsive for the drag-drop operation in the RadGanttView control.

member.name: M:Telerik.Windows.Controls.GanttView.GanttDragDropBehavior.TryApplyReorder(Telerik.Windows.Controls.Scheduling.SchedulingDragDropState,Telerik.Windows.Controls.IDateRange,System.Object)
member.summary: This method applies the changes for the reorder operation in the grid section.
member.param: The SchedulingInteractionState state used for the operation.
The item which is being dragged.
The destination groupKey, where the dragged item is being dropped.

member.name: M:Telerik.Windows.Controls.GanttView.GanttDragDropBehavior.CanDrop(Telerik.Windows.Controls.Scheduling.SchedulingDragDropState)
member.summary: Gets the value specifying whether the drag operation can be completed, or not.
member.param: DragDropState identifying the current drag operation.
member.returns: True when the drag operation can be finished, otherwise false.
member.remarks: This method is called on every mouse move. All properties in the DragDropState are valid.

member.name: M:Telerik.Windows.Controls.GanttView.GanttDragDropBehavior.Drop(Telerik.Windows.Controls.Scheduling.SchedulingDragDropState)
member.summary: When overridden in a derived class completes the drop operation. This method is called only in the context of the drop target control.
member.param: DragDropState that provides context for the current operation.
member.remarks: When the drag source and the drop target are the same control, this method is called before DragCompleted.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Controls.GanttView.RelationSlot.IsRelationToEnd

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Controls.GanttView.ColumnDefinition
member.summary: This class represents a GanttView column definition. A collection of ColumnDefinitions is used for describing the tree-list part of the GanttView control.

member.name: F:Telerik.Windows.Controls.GanttView.ColumnDefinitionBase.HeaderProperty
member.summary: Identifies the Header dependency property.

member.name: F:Telerik.Windows.Controls.GanttView.ColumnDefinitionBase.IsFrozenColumnProperty
member.summary: Identifies the IsFrozen dependency property.

member.name: F:Telerik.Windows.Controls.GanttView.ColumnDefinitionBase.ColumnWidthProperty
member.summary: Identifies the ColumnWidth dependency property.

member.name: M:Telerik.Windows.Controls.GanttView.ColumnDefinitionBase.GetSubItems
member.summary: When overridden in the derived class this method returns the sub columns of the column. By default it doesn't return any columns.
member.returns: The sub columns of the column. By default it doesn't return any columns.

member.name: E:Telerik.Windows.Controls.GanttView.ColumnDefinitionBase.PropertyChanged
member.summary: Occurs when a property value changes.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Controls.GanttView.ColumnDefinitionBase.Header
member.summary: Gets or sets the Header. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Controls.GanttView.ColumnDefinitionBase.ColumnWidth
member.summary: Gets or sets the Width of the column. If set to NaN the width is calculated depending on the Header. This is a dependency property.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Controls.GanttView.ColumnDefinitionBase.IsFrozenColumn
member.summary: Gets or sets a value determining whether the column is frozen or not. Only root-level columns could be frozen or not and all frozen columns are displayed before the non-frozen columns. This is a dependency property.

member.name: F:Telerik.Windows.Controls.GanttView.ColumnDefinition.CellEditTemplateProperty
member.summary: Identifies the CellEditTemplate dependency property.

member.name: F:Telerik.Windows.Controls.GanttView.ColumnDefinition.CellTemplateProperty
member.summary: Identifies the CellTemplate dependency property.

member.name: F:Telerik.Windows.Controls.GanttView.ColumnDefinition.CellHighlightTemplateProperty
member.summary: Identifies the CellHighlightTemplate dependency property.

member.name: F:Telerik.Windows.Controls.GanttView.ColumnDefinition.CellSelectionTemplateProperty
member.summary: Identifies the CellSelectionTemplate dependency property.

member.name: F:Telerik.Windows.Controls.GanttView.ColumnDefinition.MinWidthProperty
member.summary: Identifies the MinWidth dependency property.

member.name: F:Telerik.Windows.Controls.GanttView.ColumnDefinition.MaxWidthProperty
member.summary: Identifies the MaxWidth dependency property.

member.name: F:Telerik.Windows.Controls.GanttView.ColumnDefinition.WidthProperty
member.summary: Identifies the Width dependency property.

member.name: F:Telerik.Windows.Controls.GanttView.ColumnDefinition.IsResizableProperty
member.summary: Identifies the IsResizable dependency property.

member.name: M:Telerik.Windows.Controls.GanttView.ColumnDefinition.GetDataContextForItemOverride(System.Object)
member.summary: When overridden in the derived class this method determines which is the actual data item for the row for a given item from the list (in most cases an HierarchicalItem).
member.param: The original item from the source collection. In most cases this is an HierarchicalItem.
member.returns: The item to be used as a data item for the cell, generated for this column for the given data item. The default implementation just extracts the SourceItem from the HierarchicalItem.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Controls.GanttView.ColumnDefinition.CellEditTemplate
member.summary: Gets or sets the template of the cells in this column when in Edit mode. If this template is not set, editing is not allowed in the corresponding column. This is a dependency property.
member.remarks: The DataContext of this template is the event in the given row.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Controls.GanttView.ColumnDefinition.CellTemplate
member.summary: Gets or sets the template of the cells in this column when in normal state. If the CellHighlightTemplate or CellSelectionTemplate are not set, the selected or highlighted cells also use this template. This is a dependency property.
member.remarks: When this template is set the GanttView's rendering is slower than using directly the MemberBinding property, so consider carefully if you need to use this property or not. Please notice that the DataContext of this template is not actually the event in the given row, but a Proxy object containing the following properties: Start, End, Title, FormattedValue, OriginalEvent. The OriginalEvent is the event in the row and the FormattedValue is the value extracted through the MemberBinding. Use FormattedValue for best performance.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Controls.GanttView.ColumnDefinition.CellHighlightTemplate
member.summary: Gets or sets the template of the cells in this column when the mouse is over the cell. If this property is not set, the value of the CellTemplate is used. This is a dependency property.
member.remarks: Please notice that the DataContext of this template is not actually the event in the given row, but a Proxy object containing the following properties: Start, End, Title, FormattedValue, OriginalEvent. The OriginalEvent is the event in the row and the FormattedValue is the value extracted through the MemberBinding.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Controls.GanttView.ColumnDefinition.CellSelectionTemplate
member.summary: Gets or sets the template of the cells in this column when the mouse is over the cell. If this property is not set, the value of the CellTemplate is used.
member.remarks: Please notice that the DataContext of this template is not actually the event in the given row, but a Proxy object containing the following properties: Start, End, Title, FormattedValue, OriginalEvent. The OriginalEvent is the event in the row and the FormattedValue is the value extracted through the MemberBinding.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Controls.GanttView.ColumnDefinition.MinWidth
member.summary: Gets or sets the minimum width of the column. The value of this property doesn't restrict the ColumnWidth property.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Controls.GanttView.ColumnDefinition.MaxWidth
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum width of the column. The value of this property doesn't restrict the ColumnWidth property.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Controls.GanttView.ColumnDefinition.Width
member.summary: Gets or sets a value describing the width of the column.
member.value: A value which is either AutoHeader, AutoHeaderAndContent or FixedSize, combined with a double value defining the actual fixed size.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Controls.GanttView.ColumnDefinition.IsResizable
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the column can be resized through the column resizer or not.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Controls.GanttView.ColumnDefinition.MemberBinding
member.summary: Gets or sets the binding to be used to evaluate the Cell content.

member.name: F:Telerik.Windows.Controls.GanttView.ColumnDefinitionGroup.ChildrenProperty
member.summary: Identifies the Children dependency property.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Controls.GanttView.ColumnDefinitionGroup.Children
member.summary: Gets or sets the Children. This is a dependency property.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Controls.RadGanttView.SettingsPropertyMetadata`1
member.summary: This class is intended to be used for more simple property changed callbacks in cases when the dependency property is bound to a setting from the settings container. Its callback is not called if the sender is not the GanttView and its SettingsContainer is not initialized. The first parameter of the callback is the settings container and the second is the new value from e.NewValue.

member.name: M:Telerik.Windows.Controls.RadGanttView.SettingsPropertyMetadata`1.#ctor(`0,System.Action{Telerik.Windows.Controls.GanttView.GanttSettingsContainer,`0})
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the SettingsPropertyMetadata class. This class is intended to be used for more simple property changed callbacks in cases when the dependency property is bound to a setting from the settings container. Its callback is not called if the sender is not the GanttView and its SettingsContainer is not initialized. The first parameter of the callback is the settings container and the second is the new value from e.NewValue.
member.param: The default value to be used.

The callback to be called when the value of the property is changed. It is not called if the sender is not the GanttView and its SettingsContainer is not initialized. The first parameter of the callback is the settings container and the second is the new value from e.NewValue.

member.name: P:Telerik.Windows.Controls.GanttView.RelationInfo.IsSameSide
member.summary: True if the relation is StartStart or EndEnd; false otherwise.

member.name: M:Telerik.Windows.Controls.GanttView.Internal.TouchInteractionHelperBase.HookEvents(System.Windows.FrameworkElement)
member.summary: When overridden in the derived class, this method hooks the events to the target of the helper.
member.param: The target to which to hook the events to.

member.name: M:Telerik.Windows.Controls.GanttView.Internal.TouchInteractionHelperBase.UnhookEvents(System.Windows.FrameworkElement)
member.summary: When overridden in the derived class, this method unhooks the events from the target of the helper.
member.param: The target from which to unhook the events.

member.name: M:Telerik.Windows.Controls.GanttView.Internal.TouchEventInteractionHelper.Hook(Telerik.Windows.Rendering.LogicalCanvasPanel,Telerik.Windows.Rendering.ILogicalCanvasMouseObserver)
member.summary: Hooks a TouchInteractionHelper to the specified target and a mouse observer. When a mouse event is fired on the target it will be translated to a high-level event with high-level parameters and the corresponding method of the observer will be called. This method accepts two helpers that translate physical to logical coordinates.
member.param: The target to which events to hook the helper to.
The helper to be used to convert the coordinates on X axis.
The helper to be used to convert the coordinates on Y axis.
The observer to be notified.
member.returns: The interaction helper created as a result of the operation. Null if the action have failed.

member.name: M:Telerik.Windows.Controls.GanttView.Internal.TouchGridInteractionHelper.Hook(Telerik.Windows.Rendering.LogicalCanvasPanel,Telerik.Windows.Rendering.ILogicalCanvasMouseObserver)
member.summary: Hooks a TouchInteractionHelper to the specified target and a mouse observer. When a mouse event is fired on the target it will be translated to a high-level event with high-level parameters and the corresponding method of the observer will be called. This method accepts two helpers that translate physical to logical coordinates.
member.param: The target to which events to hook the helper to.
The helper to be used to convert the coordinates on X axis.
The helper to be used to convert the coordinates on Y axis.
The observer to be notified.
member.returns: The interaction helper created as a result of the operation. Null if the action have failed.
